a.xlink:title: Connection aggregates state, quality assessment, and statistical info for an Xbee link.
Lightweight state container with change notification callback.
Computes qualitative connection grade from retries, TX period, and RSSI with decay penalties.
Statistical counters and metrics (signal strength, periods, event counters).
Holds raw RSSI value and provides percent conversion.
TX period tracking with smoothing and min/max capture.
